references.paper_title: Culture's consequences: International differences in work-related values
references.reason: This paper is foundational in the field of cross-cultural studies, providing a framework for understanding cultural differences that is widely referenced in the paper.
This work's theory of attitude-behavior consistency is used to justify the choice of WVS data for data augmentation in the paper.

references.paper_title: Modernity at large: Cultural dimensions of globalization
references.reason: Appadurai's work on the fluidity of cultural boundaries supports the methodology of the paper and helps justify its approach.
Delanoy's discussion of the dynamic and fluid nature of culture is used to support the methodology and rationale behind using language as a proxy for culture in this work.

references.paper_title: I feel offended, don't be abusive! implicit/explicit messages in offensive and abusive language
references.reason: This paper provides a dataset used for evaluating the CultureLLM, making it highly relevant to the experimental results and evaluation of the proposed method.
